The latest stable version of Aniyomi was released Tuesday, July 2nd 2024 at 05:34 and the latest preview version was released Sunday, November 10th 2024 at 04:57.

Preview releases are intended for testing upcoming changes and may not be a stable experience.

Requires Android 8.0 or higher.
